resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105967</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105967</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207104</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Frederica: An 18th-Century Planned Community</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frederica: Eine 18th-Century Geplante 
Gemeinschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frederica : Une Communauté Prévue Par 
18th-Century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frederica: Uma Comunidade De planeamento 
18th-Century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frederica: Una Comunità Prevista 
18th-Century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Frederica: Μια προγραμματισμένη 18$ος-αιώνας 
Κοινότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frederica: Una Comunidad Prevista 
18th-Century</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">recounts British efforts to establish Georgia as a utopia in the American wilderness (1730s) and to fortify the colony against Spanish encroachment, in part through the creation of a fort and military town on St. Simons Island, Georgia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">britische Bemühungen der Nachzählungen, Georgia 
als Utopie in der amerikanischen Wildnis (1730s) herzustellen und die 
Kolonie gegen spanischen Eingriff, im Teil durch die Kreation eines 
Forts und der militärischen Stadt auf Str. Simons Insel, Georgia zu 
verstärken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efforts britanniques de recomptes d'établir la 
Géorgie comme utopie dans le désert américain (1730s) et d'enrichir
la colonie contre l'empiétement espagnol, en partie par la création 
d'un fort et d'une ville militaire sur l'île de rue Simons, la 
Géorgie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esforços britânicos dos recounts estabelecer 
Geórgia como um utopia na região selvagem americana (1730s) e 
fortify a colônia de encontro ao encroachment espanhol, na parte 
através da criação de um fort e de uma cidade militar no console do
St. Simons, Geórgia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sforzi britannici di conteggi stabilire Georgia 
come utopia nella selva americana (1730s) e fortificare la colonia 
contro encroachment spagnolo, in parte attraverso la creazione di una 
città forte e militare sull'isola della st Simons, Georgia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βρετανικές προσπάθειες δεύτερων καταμετρήσεων να 
καθιερωθεί η Γεωργία ως ουτοπία στην αμερικανική αγριότητα 
(1730s) και να ενισχυθεί η αποικία ενάντια στην ισπανική 
καταπάτηση, εν μέρει μέσω της δημιουργίας ενός οχυρού και μιας 
στρατιωτικής πόλης στο νησί του ST Simons, Γεωργία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">esfuerzos británicos de los recuentos de 
establecer Georgia como utopía en el yermo americano (1730s) y de 
fortificar a la colonia contra la usurpación española, en parte a 
través de la creación de una fortaleza y de una ciudad militar en la
isla del St. Simons, Georgia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207104</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105967</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/frederica-an-18th-century-planned-community</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
